name: Game Server Toolbox
detailed_description:
Have you ever wanted to create a game server but did not know how? Game Server Toolbox will help you every step of the way! With a easy to navigate GUI we take the frustration out of creating a game server without sacrificing full control. We have made it easier than ever to setup a game server on your own Windows personal computer or a rented Windows VPS/Dedicated Box!

So what can Game Server Toolbox do for me?
  • Create game servers by clicking a few buttons.
  • Configure your game server with a easy to navigate GUI.
  • Create and host as many game servers as your system resources allows.

What game servers are currently supported?
  • 7 Days to Die
  • The Forest
  • The Isle
  • ARK Survival Evolved
  • Rising World
  • Squad
  • More servers coming soon!

What game servers are planned to be supported?
  • Conan Exiles
  • Half-Life
  • Half-Life Deathmatch Source
  • Insurgency
  • Left 4 Dead
  • Left 4 Dead 2
  • Life is Feudal Your Own
  • Red Orchestra
  • Reign Of Kings
  • More servers coming soon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are for the software itself and does not include the requirements to run a game server. Please check the games Steam store page for game requirements.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are for the software itself and does not include the requirements to run a game server. Please check the games Steam store page for game requirements.
